post:
Hello all,

We are a vps, dedicated servers, shared hosting and colocation provider, our servers are located in our own data center in Prishtina, Kosovo and are fully owned by us, we also provide VPS in Germany and United Kingdom (we use OVH datacenters to provide Germany & UK services).

*Since 01.06.2020, all services offered in Kosovo Data center are **DDoS Protected**.

Features:
-Premium Network via Telia & Cogent (Kosovo DC)
-Developers API (Shared Hosting, VPS, Domains).
-Payment methods: Bitcoin, PayPal, Credit Card.
-Our Datacenter Location: Prishtina, Kosovo.
-VPS Locations: Kosovo, Germany, United Kingdom.
-ASN: AS207817 - ILLYSOFT, AL
-Speedtest Server: https://speedtest.illyhosting.com/
-Looking Glass: https://lg.illyhosting.com/
-Test ip: 194.5.235.3
-Test file: https://speedtest.illyhosting.com/1GB.bin
-Setup time: Instant.
-VPS Control Panel: Power control, reinstall your VPS, upload your own ISO, traffic stats, disk stats, etc.
-IPMI interface to manage dedicated servers.
-BGP session possibility for dedicated servers.
-Windows Included in VPS3-6.
-Recurring Referral Program.
-24/7 Livechat & Tickets Support.
